components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
After updating to Titanium studio 3.1.0.201304151600
When editing JSON the outline displays empty when any of the property values are negative numbers eg:

{"property":1} outline displays
{"property":"-1"} outline displays
{"property":-1} outline empty
fields.summary: JSON editor outline fails when any property value is a negative number

comments.body:
Hi Nick,

Thanks for the report.

Please can you provide some kind of reproducible steps/test case for us to follow?

Sorry I don't know what "the outline" is.

A screenshot might help (Edit -> Attachment).

Thanks!

The outline is the expandable / collapsible node tree on the bottom left of the studio default view.
Useful to navigate through complex JSON.

It worked in build: 2.1.2.201208301612 but not after Titanium Studio, build 3.1.0.201304151600 /Users/nicksearle/Downloads/PastedGraphic-1.png
